snippet.title: Moeru! Oniisan Famicom Game Preview (1989, August 8th)
snippet.description: The Burning Wild Man known in Japanese as Moeru! Onii-san (燃える! お兄さん) OVA has an ad at the end for the game. The goal of the game is to rescue Yukie from a dragon simply named Dora Gon. The game was re-branded with a circus theme and released in North America under the name Circus Caper.
